Đề xuất cải tiến chính sách dựa trên số liệu và phản hồi thực tế.

desc_mota: Job Overview VinFast is a pioneering electric vehicle (EV) company committed to revolutionizing the automotive industry with sustainable and innovative mobility solutions. As a leading player in the EV market, VinFast is dedicated to delivering high-quality, cutting-edge electric vehicles that redefine the driving experience. Our team consists of passionate professionals driven by a shared vision of creating a greener and more sustainable future through innovation, technology, and excellence. The Master Data Management (MDM) Specialist will be responsible for ensuring the accuracy, consistency, and integrity of master data across VinFast’s systems and processes. This role will involve collaborating with various business functions, data governance teams, and IT to define data standards, streamline data processes, and drive continuous improvement in our MDM practices. Key Responsibilities Data Governance: • Maintain and enforce data governance standards, policies, and procedures to ensure high-quality master data • Work closely with cross-functional teams to define data requirements and standards for various business domains such as product, supplier, customer, and financial data Data Quality Management: • Monitor data quality and identify areas for improvement, ensuring that master data is consistent, accurate, and up-to-date • Perform data cleansing activities to address data integrity issues and remove duplicates MDM System Administration: • Oversee the MDM system (such as SAP, Oracle, or other MDM platforms) to manage the lifecycle of master data • Configure, maintain, and optimize MDM workflows and processes to improve data governance efficiency Data Integration & Reporting: • Work with IT and business teams to ensure seamless integration of master data across systems and platforms • Create and manage reports and dashboards to monitor data quality and integrity Collaboration & Training: • Partner with business units to understand their data needs and provide support for the creation, modification, and maintenance of master data • Provide training and support to business users on best practices in data management and MDM tools

desc_mota: The Mission TeenCare is building the Parenting Copilot — an AI + human platform helping parents finally understand and guide their teens. We’ve grown from zero to profitability in under a year, now expanding across SEA. Our system blends 1-on-1 teen mentoring with an AI "Living Manual" that decodes each child’s motivations, behaviors, and emotional triggers — helping parents act with insight, not guesswork. We’re not building another edtech. We’re building the OS for families — and we need someone obsessed with clarity, logic, and building systems that actually work. Why This Role Exists The founder moves fast. Vision evolves daily. You’ll be the translator — turning chaos into clarity, and intuition into execution. When others are still writing memos, you’ve already mapped the flow, written the PRD, and unblocked the dev sprint. What You’ll Do Own and drive DAU/MAU Convert messy ideas into precise, data-driven PRDs. Break down AI + human workflows (mentoring, insights, parent app). Maintain the system schema — how the system learns about families. Coordinate with devs/designers to ensure clarity, speed, and zero rework. Track impact: every release tied to metrics, not feelings. Own the roadmap and keep priorities clean.
desc_yeucau: You Might Be a Fit If You… Have 2–5 years in product or business analysis (SaaS, AI, or consumer tech). Think in systems, not features. Love turning ambiguity into structure. Speak both business and engineering fluently. Write fast, think in diagrams, measure everything. Thrive in high-context, founder-driven chaos. Bonus: Experience with AI products or edtech/parenting.
desc_quyenloi: Package Base: 15–25M VND/month (depending on experience and sharpness). Bonus: up to 2 months based on impact. Equity: 0.1–0.2% for top performers. Direct access to founder & exposure to regional scale. Ruthless clarity, zero bureaucracy, high ownership.
